items.sentence: She got over the shock of her father\'s death.
Tom may have said that, but I don\'t think so.
My computer crashed and now it won\'t boot up.
Tom is my neighbor, but I hardly ever see him.
What about Tom? Shouldn\'t we invite him, too?
Do you believe that there\'s life after death?
Tom asked me why I was wearing a coat and tie.
Tom ate many of his meals off of paper plates.
Tom didn\'t know what Mary was supposed to do.
Tom didn\'t know whether Mary was safe or not.
